product_name: Merrell Proterra Vim Sport Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: Perfect for fast-paced trail adventures, the Merrell Proterra Vim Sport hiking shoes offer a great fit and amazing comfort. They'll be your go-to choice for summertime hikes. Merrell Stratafuse(TM) fabric uppers fit like a glove, breathe well, and feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for lateral support. Bellow tongues keep trail debris out. Polyester mesh linings provide moisture management when activity levels rise. Minimal polyurethane midsoles increase ground contact, enhancing stability. Merrell Proterra Vim Sport hiking shoes feature a 4mm heel-to-toe drop for a balance between cushioning and feel. Molded thermoplastic urethane arch shanks for lightweight support. The Merrell Proterra Vim Sport hiking shoes feature sticky rubber outsoles to deliver all-around versatility and dependable traction.
short_description: Perfect for fast-paced trail adventures, the Merrell Proterra Vim Sport hiking shoes offer a great fit and amazing comfort. They'll be your go-to choice for summertime hikes.
